Danbury.Morefar Back O'Beyond:
Morefar Back O'Beyond is a secretive, little-used private golf course located on 500 acres (2.0 km2) in both Danbury, Connecticut and Southeast, New York. The course can be seen from portions of the Richter Park public course and has garnered local rumor as to its origin and ownership.
Course officials do not cooperate with the press seeking information about the facility.
